text: One of the more pleasant bus terminal in the West. A hub for bus lines towards the sparsely populated and trafficked Northwest Singapore and places like Mandai Birdpark and Zoo. Bright, super airy, with some F&B stalls, bakery, and money changer (!!). Some bus pens are located faraway from the main exit due to the U-shaped layout of the terminal. Other unique features of the bus terminal are the ticketing office in A/C room and lots of electric plugs.

In the early hours, it has been observed that a significant number of students frequently bypass the line, particularly for bus 302. It is perplexing that this behavior is deemed tolerable while many individuals adhere to the appropriate queuing etiquette. This is not an isolated incident involving a handful of students; rather, it involves large groups. One must question whether this reflects the societal standards we are instilling in our future generations.

Bus 927 interval time is incorrect. I was waiting since 7:35am and bus not coming until 7:54am at CCK bus interchange.
It’s a cozy raining day and diver sleeping???

Bus interchange with buses to Cho Chu Kang as well as Yew Tee Bukit Panjang Panjang Bukit Batok Woodlands Singapore Zoo Boon Lay  Tampines Dunearn road Geylang Sentosa Gateway and Harbourfront. Next to plenty of choices for local hawker delights after shopping banking cinemas library entertainments and amenities. Walking distance cover pathway to Lot One shopping mall and nearby community club with plenty of dinning shopping banking supermarkets library cinemas entertainments groceries sundries Electric Electronic postage services and amenities nearby.. Freshly prepared healthy ingredients with tender loving caring skillful cooking and professional warm services. Walking distance to Choa Chu Kang Park with Therapeutic Garden Community Garden and breezy greenery away from busy cityscapes. Friendly fast attentive cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students tourists Expats locals visitors and families.

I took bus 188 SH5161Z from Bukit Gombak on 16/12/24 at 3.30pm. The driver was not patient enough to brake at the bus stops. He jammed braked and the passengers have to hold on very tight to the hand rails if not will fell down. I m a senior and almost fell down when he jammed braked. When alighting I was worried he will move off before I get down. There was turn around Bukit Batok he made big turn which was very dangerous. Pls educate this drivers and consider the safety of the passengers in the bus. It’s not a fun ride for him. 1 fall may cause a life….
